header.name: Quince Fennell
header.summary: An accomplished cybersecurity professional with a unique background in game development, offering a blend of technical skills in both areas. Currently excelling in the role of a Cybersecurity Specialist, with a proven track record in managing security systems, developing cybersecurity policies, and educating staff on security protocols. Prior experience in game development and programming, with a particular focus on Virtual Reality (VR) games on the Unreal Engine platform, adds a creative edge to my problem-solving abilities. Proficient in a wide range of hardware and software tools, and always ready to leverage these skills to ensure optimal security and functionality.

workExperience.description: As a Cybersecurity Specialist, my role encompassed proactively identifying and mitigating security vulnerabilities, implementing protective measures, monitoring network activity for potential threats, and responding to and resolving security incidents to safeguard organizational systems and data.

items.title: Governance and Compliance
items.description: I played a pivotal role in establishing and maintaining security policies, conducting risk assessments, implementing security controls, and ensuring compliance with industry regulations and best practices.

items.title: Policy and Documentation
items: In the area of policy, I took the NIST cybersecurity policy template as a foundation and meticulously broke it down into categories. I then connected related policies, ensuring a logical flow and interconnectedness between them. To enhance accessibility and ease of navigation, I converted the policies into markdown format and incorporated internal links, allowing for seamless navigation between different sections and policies. This approach facilitated efficient referencing and made it akin to Browse a well-structured and interconnected knowledge base, similar to navigating through a Wikipedia page.

Migrated the policy database to Confluence by Atlassian, leveraging its robust features for enhanced connectivity with a ticketing system and documentation database. This integration streamlined access to policies and facilitated efficient collaboration and knowledge sharing.
Built guest accounts for third parties, fostering seamless cooperation and enabling them to access relevant resources and contribute to collaborative efforts in a secure and controlled manner.
Maintained version control for logging purposes, ensuring accurate and comprehensive tracking of policy revisions, updates, and historical changes for audit and compliance purposes.

Developed standardized templates to ensure consistency in policy structure, formatting, and content across the organization, promoting clarity and ease of understanding while adhering to industry best practices and compliance requirements.

items.title: Procedure and Documentation
items: Collaborated with the team to efficiently migrate decades of knowledge from an unorganized folder structure into a centralized Confluence database, streamlining access and ensuring a comprehensive and easily accessible knowledge repository.
Developed standardized templates for documenting procedures, ensuring consistency in format, content, and terminology, while promoting clarity and ease of understanding.
Implemented a robust tagging system within the documentation database, enabling efficient searching and retrieval of relevant information, contributing to improved productivity and knowledge sharing.

Integrated the procedure documentation directly with the ticketing and policy systems, establishing a seamless connection that facilitated streamlined workflows and enhanced cross-functional collaboration.
Worked with various regulations including GLBA, HIPAA, PCI, and FERPA.
Developed and conducted cybersecurity training programs for employees to promote awareness, adherence to security policies, and procedures.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to perform security risk assessments, identify vulnerabilities, and recommend remediation strategies.
Participated in incident response activities, including investigating security breaches, coordinating with stakeholders, and implementing preventive measures.
Conducted regular security audits and assessments to ensure compliance with regulations and industry standards.
Contributed to the development and maintenance of a comprehensive information security framework and governance structure.
Engaged in continuous monitoring of security controls, analyzing logs, and implementing proactive measures to detect and mitigate potential threats.
Stayed updated on evolving cybersecurity trends, emerging threats, and regulatory changes, incorporating them into governance and compliance practices.

items.title: Systems Security
items.description: Protection of computer systems and networks from threats
items: Penetration Testing Experience: Utilized skills in penetration testing to assess and identify vulnerabilities within systems.
Okta: Leveraged Okta to manage and secure user authentication and access control.
1password: Utilized 1password as a password manager to enhance security and streamline access management.

Palo Alto: Managed Palo Alto firewalls, taking over ownership after a third-party separation with RSU. Organized configurations, implemented object variables for human-readable security rules, and established site-to-site VPN tunnels for connectivity to Azure Active Directory and the Student Management system.
Vendor Systems Experience: Conducted proof-of-value deployments for various vendor systems, including Horizion3.ai, Checkpoint, Darktrace, and DataDog.
Manage Engine: Configured Manage Engine tools, including Desktop Central RMM for efficient desktop management and deployed Log 360 SIEM for comprehensive log management and analysis.

items.title: Azure Active Directory
items: Deployed AD Connect for Hybrid Enviornment
Deployed Multifactor Authentication
Deployed Self Service Password Reset
Deployed SAML Authentication for SAAS vendors
Deployed Conditional Access Rules
Deployed Identity Governence and Access Reviews
Deployed Data Loss Prevention Policy
Deployed Email Security Policy
Deployed Microsoft Defender for Endpoint (EDR)(ATP)
Deployed Privilaged Identity Management Principles
Deployed Windows Security Policy through Microsoft Defender and Intune
Deployed Network Security Groups and Virtual Firewall
Deployed Certificate based API authentication for automation
Deployed Simulated Phishing Training
Deployed AAD Domain Services for Secure LDAP Authentication
Working toward implamenting Vulnerability Management
Experience with Hardware Authentication

items.title: Systems Administration
items: Remote Management and Scripting: Utilized Desktop Central and Level.io for remote management and scripting.

items.title: Azure
items: Microsoft Intune: Deployed custom provisioning drives for automatic imaging and enrollment of devices, implemented configuration management, deployed applications and Windows updates, and configured both hybrid joined and AAD-only joined devices.

Azure Active Directory: Utilized scripting for provisioning students from external systems, group assignment based on enrolled classes, and password updates for service and shared accounts. Customized AD Connect attribute sync, gained familiarity with Log Analytics fundamentals and virtual networking, deployed Azure Virtual Desktop including shared host pools, persistent VMs, and remote applications. Developed workflows for image creation and updating, implemented dynamic grouping for automatic application and desktop assignment, and deployed FxLogix.
Active Directory: Managed Active Directory infrastructure.
Global Policy: Assisted in implamenting and managing global policies.
DHCP and DNS: Assisted in configuring DHCP and DNS services.
Print Management: Utilized Uniflow Online Print Management and API scripts for print management, I also have experience with Microsoft Univeral Print.

Atlassian Tools Suite: Deployed Confluence knowledge databases for documentation and policy, implemented Jira Service Desk for ticketing systems, utilized Atlassian Administration for user provisioning and integration, and gained experience with asset management.
IIS Website Management: Managed IIS websites for both internal tools and productions systems.
Configuration Experience: Experience configuring systems like Salesforce, Laserfiche Document Management system, Blackboard.
Microsoft SQL Database Administration: Administered Microsoft SQL databases for student information systems, various internal systems, and student learning course enviornment.

workExperience.description: My role involved providing technical support, managing computer hardware and software installations, and troubleshooting network issues.
items: Performed installations, configurations, and maintenance of microcomputer hardware and software.
Expertly handled networking and phone cable/hardware installation, as well as troubleshooting.
Provided exceptional L1-L2 tech support, resolving technical issues promptly and effectively.
Demonstrated excellent customer service skills, ensuring a positive user experience.

workExperience.description: As a Freelance Unreal Developer, I collaborated with clients to design and develop interactive virtual experiences using Unreal Engine, ensured smooth functionality, optimized performance, and delivered visually compelling projects.
items: Developed a Virtual Model Unit that allowed clients to customize and visualize their ideal apartment space, enabling them to make informed purchase decisions. | Virtual Model Unit

Created a Virtual Exam Room where executive-level decision makers could interact with and customize equipment placements, assisting in the design process for hospitals and medical facilities. | Exam Room Configuration
Designed and implemented a Workflow Simulator that facilitated the examination of traffic flow within building designs, optimizing layouts for optimal efficiency. | Workspace Simulation

workExperience.description: As the Lead Unreal Developer at Chronos, I spearheaded the design and development of immersive virtual experiences using Unreal Engine, leveraging my expertise to guide the team and create visually captivating applications.
items: Developed immersive virtual experiences using Unreal Engine as part of a small team, including a user experience deployed to Samsung GearVR, a mobile phone-based VR platform | Vr Guest
Created a VR puzzle game published on Steam, demonstrating proficiency in Unreal Engine and game development. | Astroderps
Gained valuable experience and knowledge working with virtual reality technologies and collaborating with a team in a professional environment.

workExperience.description: Maintain and organize data colected by the security team to produce useful information
items: Oversaw multiple databases and executed security focues software and hardware solutions
Prepared training sessons, developed technology-based training solutions
Migrated Decades worth of Excel spreates to a Microsoft Access Database
Aditionally worked as a security officer and Training Administrator

workExperience.description: As an archivist's assistant, I meticulously organized and cataloged archival materials, provided comprehensive support for administrative tasks, and used my skill set to assist the department.
items: Constructed graphics for the university's library using Adobe Suite.
Worked with NSU President on an animated Christmas card for the community using Adobe After Effects.
Provided comprehensive support, undertaking administrative and operational tasks.
Organized archival materials, alphabetizing and categorizing documents for efficient retrieval.
Managed film strips, including cutting, labeling, and cataloging.
Assisted with inventory management and maintained accurate records.
Tech support
Advertisement/Menu Design
Manual labor
Food and Customer services

technicalProficiency.intro: This section lists the software and systems that I have worked with in the past. I'll keep the ones I know more about at the front of each list.

items.name: Windows
items.description: My current main OS; my current job lives in Windows, so I do as well.

items.name: Linux
items.description: I ran Linux as my main OS for quite a few years, changing back to Windows for work requirements. Some distros I used are Kali, Arch, #!, and Ubuntu. When I get to building a new machine, I'll be starting fresh with Qubes OS.

categories.name: Languages
categories.intro: Most programming languages follow similar principles; once you abstract those, every other language is just learning syntax. So, I try not to get hooked on any language and flow around based on my current task and interests.

items.name: Python
items.description: I have a decent grasp of it. This is the language I want to deep dive into for neural networks

items.name: VBA
items.description: Bane of my existence but needed for the fun stuff in Excel

items.name: HTML, CSS, JS
items.description: Useful for websites like this one

items.name: SQL
items.description: Just know enough to get me in trouble

personalExperience.summary: In addition to my professional qualifications, I possess a diverse range of personal interests that fuel my curiosity and drive for continuous learning. From exploring the realm of 3D printing and the intricacies of miniature wargaming to diving into the immersive world of gaming, I find joy in both creative and technical pursuits. Building computer hardware, exploring cloud computing, and tinkering with home lab networking allows me to combine my passion for technology and hands-on problem-solving. Alongside these hobbies, I am deeply fascinated by the realms of art, neural networks, large language models, mathematics, and logic. Additionally, I eagerly engage in the imaginative storytelling of Dungeons and Dragons. These diverse interests reflect my well-rounded nature and drive to continuously explore and discover new realms of knowledge and creativity.
